hackathon-description-text: MakeMIT is back for it's 4th year, with more hackers, hardware, and workshop space than ever before! Our fast-paced structure promotes an innovative, creative atmosphere, geared towards those who are excited and passionate about designing and building. Come meet other enthusiastic hackers, work with cutting edge technology, and turn your crazy ideas into reality!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=84 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA 02139, USA
hackathon-description-header: MakeMIT is the world’s premier hardware hackathon, with 300 hackers, 16 hours, and a 3-room toolshop to help you build the ultimate hardware hack.
